refnamediv.refpurpose: explicitely wait for the first result available in a given list of results

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The PAwaitAny function can be called on objects of type PAResl returned by a PAsolve call. It allows to explicitely block the scilab execution until the first result among the list specified is available. If all results have already been retrieved via PAwaitAny, an error message will appear.

listitem.para: an object of type PAResl returned by a call to PAsolve.
an optional timeout (in ms), the PAwaitFor call will block until the results are available or the timeout expires.
the return value of the task.
the index of the task in the result list resl.
